gmh5225/android-reverse-engineering-skil.title: android-reverse-engineering
gmh5225/android-reverse-engineering-skil.description: Decompile Android APK/XAPK/JAR/AAR files and extract/document HTTP APIs (Retrofit/OkHttp/URLs) with a repeatable workflow.

gmh5225/awesome-ai-security/llm-attacks-.title: llm-attacks-security
gmh5225/awesome-ai-security/llm-attacks-.description: Guide for LLM security attacks: prompt injection, jailbreaking, data extraction, and where to place resources in README.md.

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/binary-lif.title: binary-lifting
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/binary-lif.description: Expertise in binary lifting techniques - converting machine code to LLVM IR for analysis, decompilation, and recompilation. Use this skill when working on reverse engineering, binary analysis, deobfuscation, or converting binaries to higher-level representations.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/binary-lif.descriptionEn: Expertise in binary lifting techniques - converting machine code to LLVM IR for analysis, decompilation, and recompilation. Use this skill when working on reverse engineering, binary analysis, deobfuscation, or converting binaries to higher-level representations.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/binary-lif.descriptionCn: 二进制提升技术专家 - 将机器码转换为 LLVM IR 以进行分析、反编译和重编译。适用于逆向工程、二进制分析、反混淆或将二进制转换为高级表示的工作。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/compiler-d.title: compiler-development
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/compiler-d.description: Expertise in compiler development using LLVM infrastructure including frontend design, IR generation, optimization passes, and code generation. Use this skill when building custom programming languages, implementing DSL compilers, or working on compiler internals.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/compiler-d.descriptionEn: Expertise in compiler development using LLVM infrastructure including frontend design, IR generation, optimization passes, and code generation. Use this skill when building custom programming languages, implementing DSL compilers, or working on compiler internals.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/compiler-d.descriptionCn: 使用 LLVM 基础设施进行编译器开发的专家，包括前端设计、IR 生成、优化 Pass 和代码生成。适用于构建自定义编程语言、实现 DSL 编译器或研究编译器内部机制。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/dynamic-in.title: dynamic-instrumentation
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/dynamic-in.description: Expertise in LLVM-based dynamic binary instrumentation, runtime tracing, and program monitoring. Use this skill when implementing runtime analysis tools, code coverage systems, profilers, or dynamic security monitors.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/dynamic-in.descriptionEn: Expertise in LLVM-based dynamic binary instrumentation, runtime tracing, and program monitoring. Use this skill when implementing runtime analysis tools, code coverage systems, profilers, or dynamic security monitors.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/dynamic-in.descriptionCn: 基于 LLVM 的动态二进制插桩、运行时追踪和程序监控专家。适用于实现运行时分析工具、代码覆盖率系统、性能分析器或动态安全监控。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-learn.title: llvm-learning
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-learn.description: Comprehensive learning resources and tutorials for LLVM, Clang, and compiler development. Use this skill when helping users learn LLVM internals, find educational resources, or understand compiler concepts.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-learn.descriptionEn: Comprehensive learning resources and tutorials for LLVM, Clang, and compiler development. Use this skill when helping users learn LLVM internals, find educational resources, or understand compiler concepts.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-learn.descriptionCn: LLVM、Clang 和编译器开发的全面学习资源和教程。适用于帮助用户学习 LLVM 内部机制、查找教育资源或理解编译器概念。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-obfus.title: llvm-obfuscation
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-obfus.description: Expertise in LLVM-based code obfuscation techniques including OLLVM, control flow flattening, string encryption, virtualization, and anti-analysis methods. Use this skill when working on code protection, anti-reverse engineering, or implementing custom obfuscation passes.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-obfus.descriptionEn: Expertise in LLVM-based code obfuscation techniques including OLLVM, control flow flattening, string encryption, virtualization, and anti-analysis methods. Use this skill when working on code protection, anti-reverse engineering, or implementing custom obfuscation passes.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-obfus.descriptionCn: 基于 LLVM 的代码混淆技术专家，包括 OLLVM、控制流平坦化、字符串加密、虚拟化和反分析方法。适用于代码保护、反逆向工程或实现自定义混淆 Pass。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-optim.title: llvm-optimization
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-optim.description: Expertise in LLVM optimization passes, performance tuning, and code transformation techniques. Use this skill when implementing custom optimizations, analyzing pass behavior, improving generated code quality, or understanding LLVM's optimization pipeline.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-optim.descriptionEn: Expertise in LLVM optimization passes, performance tuning, and code transformation techniques. Use this skill when implementing custom optimizations, analyzing pass behavior, improving generated code quality, or understanding LLVM's optimization pipeline.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-optim.descriptionCn: LLVM 优化 Pass、性能调优和代码转换技术专家。适用于实现自定义优化、分析 Pass 行为、提升生成代码质量或理解 LLVM 优化管线。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-secur.title: llvm-security
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-secur.description: Expertise in LLVM security features including sanitizers, hardening techniques, exploit mitigations, and secure compilation. Use this skill when implementing security-focused compiler features, analyzing vulnerabilities, or hardening applications.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-secur.descriptionEn: Expertise in LLVM security features including sanitizers, hardening techniques, exploit mitigations, and secure compilation. Use this skill when implementing security-focused compiler features, analyzing vulnerabilities, or hardening applications.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-secur.descriptionCn: LLVM 安全特性专家，包括 Sanitizer、加固技术、漏洞缓解和安全编译。适用于实现安全相关的编译器特性、分析漏洞或加固应用程序。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-tooli.title: llvm-tooling
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-tooli.description: Expertise in LLVM tooling development including Clang plugins, LLDB debugger extensions, Clangd/LSP, and LibTooling. Use this skill when building source code analysis tools, refactoring tools, debugger extensions, or IDE integrations.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-tooli.descriptionEn: Expertise in LLVM tooling development including Clang plugins, LLDB debugger extensions, Clangd/LSP, and LibTooling. Use this skill when building source code analysis tools, refactoring tools, debugger extensions, or IDE integrations.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/llvm-tooli.descriptionCn: LLVM 工具开发专家，包括 Clang 插件、LLDB 调试器扩展、Clangd/LSP 和 LibTooling。适用于构建源码分析工具、重构工具、调试器扩展或 IDE 集成。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/mlir-devel.title: mlir-development
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/mlir-devel.description: Expertise in MLIR (Multi-Level Intermediate Representation) and CIR (Clang IR) development for domain-specific compilation and high-level optimizations. Use this skill when building ML compilers, domain-specific languages, or working with multi-level compilation pipelines.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/mlir-devel.descriptionEn: Expertise in MLIR (Multi-Level Intermediate Representation) and CIR (Clang IR) development for domain-specific compilation and high-level optimizations. Use this skill when building ML compilers, domain-specific languages, or working with multi-level compilation pipelines.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/mlir-devel.descriptionCn: MLIR（多级中间表示）和 CIR（Clang IR）开发专家，用于领域特定编译和高级优化。适用于构建机器学习编译器、领域特定语言或多级编译管线。

gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/static-ana.title: static-analysis
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/static-ana.description: Expertise in LLVM-based static analysis including dataflow analysis, pointer analysis, taint tracking, and program verification. Use this skill when implementing security scanners, bug finders, code quality tools, or performing program analysis research.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/static-ana.descriptionEn: Expertise in LLVM-based static analysis including dataflow analysis, pointer analysis, taint tracking, and program verification. Use this skill when implementing security scanners, bug finders, code quality tools, or performing program analysis research.
gmh5225/awesome-llvm-security/static-ana.descriptionCn: 基于 LLVM 的静态分析专家，包括数据流分析、指针分析、污点追踪和程序验证。适用于实现安全扫描器、Bug 检测工具、代码质量工具或程序分析研究。
